ygData.subject: Re: what trade window tactic?..... bone chips from Skarana
ygData.msgSnippet: oops.. I subsribe to 5 or so onelists and did not get to the other messages on this topic.  Thanks all that answered, so my question was already answered and
ygData.messageBody:
oops.. I subsribe to 5 or so onelists and did not get to the other messages
on this topic. Thanks all that answered, so my question was already
answered and sorry for the extra email. I am impressed however though, this
list was so dead I forgot I was on it.

I do have a quest question though. I was doing the quest for Cromils
remains. For those of you that don't know it is a quest acquired in Kaladim
and takes you to South Karana to retrieve the remains of a famous dwarf that
are held by a putrid skeleton at the undead camp next to the bridge to North
karana. This is also the camp that spawns Lord Grimrot so careful when
approaching it. If he is there, just come back later. I finally found a
day when he was not and started killing all the putrids. I am a paladin
with ward undead so I used that to lure them away so that if Grimrot spawned
I hopefully would be fighting out of aggro range. Anyway, my question is
this. I receive either 6 or 8 sets of individual unmarked "bone chips" that
were all marked lore. There is no differentiation between them, but they
are all the same, but don't stack. I have asked in most zones, and scoured
the net for any info but cannot find anything. I did get cromils remains as
they are marked "dwarf bones" not "bone chips". But now i have several
slots taken up with these lore items that I don't know what to do with. Any
help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks :-)




>From: "Jeff" <auskay@...>
>
>ok, sounds good, but do you have to keep doing it? I mean all they have to
>do is click cancel right?
>Thanks for the reply Rus... I am a paladin, and we lose kills to everyone.
>
>
>>From: Rus <icekool@...>
>>
>>put something in a casters trade window and they cant cast spells.
>>
>>From: John Adams <thugsy@...>
>>
>>What trade window Tactic?
>>
>>>exp with this. The trade window trick someone gave me >seems to work
>>ok, but
>>>I would love more tactics.
>>
>>
>>>Chrisstauf of the Lightbringers guild
>>>cleric of the 14th circle
>>>Karana server
>>
